name: Aquatic adventure
description:
This game is still in alpha.

Dive into the all new survival/sandbox game, Aquatic adventure! Explore, fight and imagine to adventure while you survive and thrive with the creatures of the ocean from the Imagisea period, a time period where everything is possible! So fasten your seatbelts guys, this is gonna be a bumpy ride!

Cybrog has been developing this game for about 3 years now.

In that 3 years we have been able to develop an underwater experience you cannot easily forget!

What does this game have in store for you?:

  • Build mode - Build whatever you wnat in this ultimate sandbox world!
  • Adventure mode - Gather materials to survive the dangers of this unforgiving realm
  • World selection - Select the perfect realm that you want to explore!
  • Many fish and materials to discover - This game has so many creatures and building materials it's unbelievable!

What's coming next?

Check out our devblog on wordpress!: https://aquaticadventuredevblog.wordpress.com/

New features will be added as soon as possible so stay alert!
